altTitles.en: ラヴトゥギャザー

description.en:
A collection of sweet, cute BL one-shots. Nothing too explicit.  
  
1) Making Love  
  
Katsuki, a writer for a gardening magazine, falls in love at first sigh with Okami, a charismatic potter, and his works but these feelings could only ever remain unrequited…?  
  
2) Only Have Eyes For You  
  
"After 6 months of courtship, my lover who's older than me by 2 years finally agrees to date me. Yet he's still so cold to me."  
  
3) Love's Holiday  
  
"Atsushi and I have been friends since Junior High. We're close to eachother. That's why the two of us came here together… But, lately Atsushi seems to be hiding something. I notice because I have been secretly in love with him for a long time."  
  
4) Just Take It Easy  
  
Momose Fuuta has always dreamed of living in Tokyo but now that he's there for college, his roommate is rather… undesirable.  
  
5) Force of Love  
  
"6 months ago, my lover, a fighter jet pilot, died because of my error in judgement. Since then, I decided never to get involved with a pilot again!"  
  
6) Jealousy Baby  
  
"I, Sudou Aki, was entrusted by my sister, a divorcee, to babysit my nephew, Kouta, during our summer vacation from the university." Will this ruin Aki and Eiji's time together?  
  
Koi no Myouyaku continues chapter 1's story, Making Love.
